website_summaries.verdict: Extremely thin, clear case means you won't be adding any bulk to your smartphone.
pros: Sharp-looking, clear case that'll show off the style of the phone
Includes raised edges around both the screen and the camera to protect these areas from scratches
Low price point for a phone case
Will not hinder wireless charging process
cons: Won't protect against drops from much height

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. The case adds virtually no bulk to the phone and even adds a bit of grip to the slick stainless bands around the phone. Do not expect this case to protect from major drops. That is not what this case is for. This is for people who want to prevent scratches on the back glass and stainless steel bands. Another great feature is that the camera bump no longer rest on the surface when laying down! If you want something minimal that doesn’t obstruct the look of the phone and provides everyday scratch protection, then look no further.
customer_reviews.author: alberto

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Good case but turned yellow or tan. It was crystal clear as they say but within a month it changed color. I would look elsewhere, there are some being sold with anti yellow composite. Update 3/21/18: Katie from Illudesign contacted and helped me get a replacement case. The customer service was amazing. I had the case next day and as a result I would def buy from them again. Their customer service is worth it alone. Katie sent me the black tan case and that so far isuch better.
customer_reviews.author: alexr

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and slim design without compromising phone design
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Not bulky, clear and slim so the iPhone XS design is visible and remains lightweight and not bulky. The iPhone alone was too slippery to handle and this eliminated that but you still see the sleek original phone design.
customer_reviews.author: Lynell D'Sylva

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case exactly as described on product page
customer_reviews.text: Just received the case. It appears to be a high quality thin case. Fits IPhone Xs very well. Vendor shows pictures on product page that show exactly how it fits. Has a slight lip above the screen as described. Will see if it solves the TPU yellowing problem.
customer_reviews.author: Willyb

customer_reviews.title: Read before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: Case comes as described. If you're looking for something heavy duty, obviously this ain't it. But it does protect against everyday wear and tear. I also agree that you can notice from the back that this case wasn't made for iPhone XS as you can see the gap between the case cutout and the camera. I have a black model however so it's not noticable. Would not recommend for other colors. The side button is hard to press when put on. I find myself using too much pressure and end up pressing the volume up button and accidentally screenshotting a lot. Other than that, cosmetically this is a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Turns yellow after few months of use
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. The cover turns ugly yellow after few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Vinyasa

customer_reviews.title: and it just feels perfect in my hands
customer_reviews.text: This case is the sleekest case I’ve ever had. It doesn’t make my iPhone X feel bulky . The case doesn’t take away the natural beauty from the phone, and it just feels perfect in my hands. I don’t know if the case will change color over time. And I also would not recommend this case if you’re looking for a case to protect your phone from hard drops. The case is specifically for fashion and scratch resistance use only. And if you’re like me who take very good care of your phone and want to keep the phones original appearance, then this case won’t dusappoint you.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Mac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case, does not make the phone heavy or bulky.
customer_reviews.text: This case is my favorite of all iPhone cases I have had over the years. It is slim, easy to hold without being sticky, does not get grungy over time, and really protects the phone. I have dropped my phone multiple times, without any problems to the phone. I decided to write a review today, because this morning my phone took a pretty hard fall onto pavement, landing right on the corner. Previously, such falls have always led to a cracked screen. The corner of the case is a bit scratched, but even that is not that visible. I can feel it if I touch it. But my phone survived unscathed. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ana S.

customer_reviews.title: Not transparent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I liked the material and thought it would allow me to see my iPhone X clearly. Unfortunately, it has these tiny dots throughout the inside of the case. It’s not clear like expected. I’d take a pic, but I don’t want to take off the case and I’m not gonna bother returning anyways. Lol Good case for the price regardless. Just wish it was completely clear.
customer_reviews.author: A. Saffa

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistencies detract from otherwise good case.
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived. I had to put it on, take it off, and put it on again to get it to fit right around the corners and cutouts. This is a fiddly issue that many people won't notice or care about. I love how grippy the case is. The raised protection for the camera housing is present and is raised. The bumper around the screen, though, while present, is inconsistently thick. Depending on the angle you hold the phone, one side has the raised edge, the other does not. Looking down the screen (from bottom to top), one corner has noticeably more raised edge than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Feels so cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same case 6 months ago and I am attaching the awesome pictures from that case. Because of I was so happy with the purchase I came back and ordered again after 6 months and it turned out to be a total disappointment. It feels so cheap and not sturdy at all. The first 3 pictures are from the previous order and the last photo from this order I received. See how the camera part is not aligned at all. Very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Get a good screen film to maximize the protection.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best-fitting TPU case for the iPhone X. The case doesn’t cover up the iPhone X’s beatiful design and has port cutouts with precise tolerances with the soft TPU providing ample daily use protection. The inside of the case has miniscule raised dotted patterns that elminiate case tomphone adhesion and that “rainbow” effect. Lastly, the slight dark tint compliments the space gray color of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Luis P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Case That Preserves The Beauty of The Phone
customer_reviews.text: Grippy. Rubbery. Bendy. Super form fitting. Zero bulk. Lint resistant. I’ve never experienced discoloring in cases so I wouldn’t know from experience if this material is susceptible to that. I like that it perfectly displays the phones color and keeps the front looking like there is no case even though the case is raised in front to keep it elevated from surface if placed faced down. That’s probably due to being clear all the way around Also I purchased this for the iPhone Xs and it fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Indovino

customer_reviews.title: Favorite minimalist iPhone X case
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 different cases for the iPhone X - my main points of interest were thinness and grip. This ESR one was my favorite by far. It's very thin (almost like a Peel case) but has a good grip and can take a bump from a short distance. It's a great case to keep your phone true to form and visible while still having a solid amount of protection. Would like to note that the camera bump/lip is not flush with the back of the case (again, like the Peel cases) but I knew this going in and it wasn't a con for me since it kept the overall thinness down
customer_reviews.author: Peter Le

customer_reviews.title: Transparent Black - Perfect For iPhone X in Space Gray
customer_reviews.text: This is THE case for the iPhone X in Space Gray. I originally got this same brand in clear and it made the phone's finish look silver. Then I ordered the transparent case ... same one ... but with a black finish. You can't even tell that there is a case on the phone. It is gorgeous! It does show fingerprints but that doesn't bother me at all. Edit: Some reviews mention the little dot pattern on the back ... they barely show on the transparent black .. I can only see them under very bright light. On the clear version they showed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Gal

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection With Perfect Minimalist Design
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to protect my new iPhone X. I wanted to protect the phone from scratches and general wear without adding bulk or covering up the natural look. The “fit” is perfect and allows the phone to lay flat so the camera lens doesn’t touch the table. The plastic is made of a soft, flexible material. There is no texture (the plastic is smooth) but it is not “slick” and will not cause the phone to slide out of your hand. Also, being soft, the plastic will not have a tendency to crack! No need to get the model with the silver paint, just get the clear one!
customer_reviews.author: N. Brown

customer_reviews.title: This slim case fits dBrand skins!
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever thought "will this case fit my dBrand skin? Well I'm here to tell you that it will. I had the skin that wrapped up the sides of the phone and it worked. So now I have a svelte looking case with an equally nice looking skin and I didn't have to pay $25 for the other higher end case that is marketed as "slim" as well **Edit just so you know if you're running a tempered screen protector the case will does not extend high enough to protect the screen
customer_reviews.author: Daohaus

customer_reviews.title: Over My expectation. Bravo...... I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and much much better than I expected. This is a well made product and was delivered very quickly. Very good quality. Please see the picture I attached, look at the inside, that presents how serious ESR made, I am happy , strongly recommend.Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H.

customer_reviews.title: Neat clear case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. I wanted a clear case for a while but there’s so many to chose from. I went with this one and I’m glad I did because it’s not too thick yet it feels durable. The case does have a dot pattern all around it but I honestly don’t mind it at. The mute switch and bottom charging port have a great cutout. I don’t think anyone will have problems accessing it. This is my first TPU case in a while and I’m really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Baldemar

customer_reviews.title: It’s almost invisible. Witch is both good and bad.
customer_reviews.text: This case, like its tempered glass counterpart, is gorgeous in any iteration you choose to buy it in. Just like the tempered glass version, I chose my case to be clear. It is easy to put on and it barely changes the feel and weight of the iPhone X. This means that your phone isn’t bulky or heavier. It will also proyecto it from being scratched or dented (if the latter is even possible). This, however, comes at a price as the case will not add significant protection. This case will ask you to be as careful as of it didn’t have any case on. Design and ease of use is perfect. It suffers in the protection category.
customer_reviews.author: R. noloc

customer_reviews.title: Okay case
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay case. When I went looking for cases for my XS, there weren’t very many options out there. I had some particulars I was looking for: - It does fit my phone fine. - It does have a tiny bit of a raised edge around the face and camera. Tiny. I would prefer higher. - It is clear What I don’t like is that it is kind of slippery. Some posters commented on the grip. It’s more slippery than grippy IMHO. I foresee the sides coming loose very easily.
customer_reviews.author: barbara b.

customer_reviews.title: it protects phone but
customer_reviews.text: I drop my phone all the time by accident, having this case and a screen protector definitely helps protect my phone, no complaint there. However, after a year of use, I noticed that the edge of my Iphone X has many scratches, no shining as expected after wiping it. I don't know how that could happen, my only guess is that maybe dirt got into the case, and kept moving inside the case and scratched the edges. For that, I am giving it a 3 star instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: H.J.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel and look of this case, but it’s not a close fit with my iPhone X. It’s tiny bit too wide. I can squeeze the sides inward. I think it’s a production issue. UPDATE (from 2 to 4 stars): ESR team reached out and sent me another one to try but the same problem. Then they offered me another case and this one is perfect. It’s the ESR Slim Cover Soft TPU Cover. It fits perfectly. I wish they had that one in black. But their CS team is on it and they go above and beyond to fix your problem or get your money back.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Thin clear coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive clear case for my iPhone X that would provide coverage and not add too much bulk. This case fits the bill. Covers up your iPhone X while still allowing you to show off the design. Perfect for you minimalists out there. The corners are not rubberized like the tech 21 cases so I’m not sure how it would stack up against those cases if dropped which is why I didn’t give it five stars. If I should drop it at some point, I’ll amend my review to include the details. Overall I am very happy with this case.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: yas
customer_reviews.text: love this! my iphone is white so i like to keep its original design. it is rubbery and flexible but good thiccc. only thing is when i have a wide adapter to plug in let’s say for connecting to bose, the rubber blocks it from fully connecting so i have to remove the cover. like the iphone charger has no problem cause its width is tiny. i mean i could cut the sides off to make it exposed but nah. overall i like it and it does thee job.
customer_reviews.author: tinawinapina

customer_reviews.title: Not the best purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I am editing my previous review. I purchased this towards the end of Oct 2018. By the beginning of Feb it had turned from clear to Brown. It was under warranty, so i reached out to the company to see about getting it replaced. They responded once and I supplied a picture of what was going on, like they asked, and then never heard back from them. it is now April 1st so I am revising my review. If you want a clear case that going to turn brown after only a couple months of use, this one is the perfect one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap case
customer_reviews.text: Simple, cheap, and reasonable protection for the thickness. I really like this case and will likely buy this or similar in the future when it gets old or dirty. I bought another case under a different brand for about 10 cents difference and it turned out to be 100% identical. Likely they are all manufactured by the same place and just sold wholesale to resellers, so if it ever goes over $10 look at some other sellers. I have had some small drops on hard surfaces while putting my phone in my pocket and had no issues with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Glamdring

customer_reviews.title: Not for iPhone XS
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: the seller contacted me & was able to send me a replacement free of charge & without having to return the old case. The buttons for the new case line up & aren’t hard to press! I love this case now ! Thank you!! LOVE the slimness of the case, however it is not for iPhone XS. The buttons don’t line up which it make it hard to press them. It’s really hard to take screenshots with this case. Also the bottom appears to fit very crooked on the phone. I gave it 3 stars because I really do like the slimness of the case but I wish the buttons would line up.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela Granados

customer_reviews.title: This case Yellows and stretches over time
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for about 6months before it started yellowing and stretching. The yellowing i can deal with but the stretching I cannot. Brand new the case wrapped perfectly but after a few months of use I felt my phone sliding around the case making it prone to scratches from dust that gets trapped in there.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect low profile fit for iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Way too early to tell how quickly it starts to turn colors but it fits the iPhone X perfectly. It's about as slim and form fitting as you can get. The camera nor the screen touch a surface when you set it down and hopefully the plastic will prevent a screen shatter if the corner hits on a low level drop. If you're clumsy, get a high end protective case. If you're like me and have a couple drops a year from 3-4 feet and want to keep the original look and size of the phone, I don't think you can go wrong at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great slim fit, less likely to slip from hands, barely visibly noticeable
customer_reviews.text: Great slim fit, less likely to slip from hands, barely visibly noticeable. only issue is that it will slightly begin to turn yellow over time, but they should last for about a year before discoloration affects the overall look, and cheap enough to just buy a new one after a year if it looks bad.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Templar

customer_reviews.title: Just What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a THIN but protective case for my iPhone XS. This is perfect. It's almost unnoticeable. It provides pretty good surface grip, and what I would consider reasonable protection. It's no Otterbox (if you drop your phone and it lands a certain way, I'm certain there would be damage). So, beware.
customer_reviews.author: Evildead11

customer_reviews.title: Medium to low quality case
customer_reviews.text: Pro’s - low price - does not limit gesture control on bottom of iPhone XS screen Cons: - Cutouts on bottom of case a very crooked - Cutouts partially cover some sound holes - The plastic is fairly hazy (not super clear, perhaps due to the “dots” embossed on inside to prevent sticky look) - Very susceptible to fingerprints - Case causes volume buttons and power button to inadvertently activate
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and protection
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this case. It's slim, adds very little bulk to the size of the phone. It covers the edges completely, which I like. The material is soft and does not chip when dropped or hit, and it is easy to grip. Comes in a couple of colors, opaque or semi transparent. Would but again.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Darling

customer_reviews.title: Great case, great price
customer_reviews.text: this ESR case has been my go to for the past 4-5yrs. Through 3 different iPhones. I drop my phone constantly. Sometimes little slips, but also some really full on smack downs. My phones have always survived unscathed (also use a glass screen protector). Only drawback to this case, is that it does yellow over time. But for $10, it’s worth just doing an annual replacement.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Protector Cracked Within a Week
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector is hard and after one drop, it cracked. Now I have a huge crack across the protector and need to replace it. I've never had a screen protector this fragile before. Of course, I'm glad it wasn't my screen itself that cracked but I don't want to keep replacing the protector if it can't handle the drops.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin N.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely case but covered in micro scratches
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sent this product to me via express post for free as a replacement for the first one that was covered in scratches and scuffs. Could have been a lovely case if this one too was not covered in micro scratches. It’s a perfect case in every way, my phone looks almost like it’s not got a case on. But the tiny scratches are making me unhappy overall. If you don’t mind this blemish, then I’d say go for it!
customer_reviews.author: ahila

customer_reviews.title: Material too thin
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that this specific material because it was too thin, I know it wasn’t going to protect my phone, had to return it Plus it wasn’t raised around the camera so the stainless steel will scratch
customer_reviews.author: Shelsy

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a case that would complement my iPhone X. Some cases were too bulky, too flimsy, etc. This case was just right (both in price and function). I don't like the smudges that a clear case provides but can live with the frequent wiping and cleaning. I would recommend this product. It is low profile, yet protects high-touch and risk prone areas of the iPhone X.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Clear? Not for long!
customer_reviews.text: This case turned yellow/brown almost right away. The case on the left is this product after 10 months, compared to a new one on the right. UPDATE: the company contacted me and offered to send me a replacement case. Rather than choose the same case (because of the yellowing), I chose a different case altogether, which they happily shipped to me. The rating on this case remains the same, two stars, but the customer service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: sariahjane

customer_reviews.title: Great case for iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of JETech for iPhone case, so I confident bought 3x JETech clear case for iPhone X. The JETech clear case for iPhone X is great for protection. However, it is really not comfortable to hold the iPhone X by one hand. So, I tried this case and very happy. My hand felt more comfortable with this case. I highly recommend this case for iPhone X.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: No raised screen edge.
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice and has a generous raised edge around the camera, BUT there is no raised edge on the screen side as described in the product info. In fact, the bumper is slightly below the screen, offering no protection if the phone we to be placed face done or land on the screen if dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good case
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for almost 2 months now. So far, the case has kept its nice, clear color... No discoloration. The fit is nice... not floppy and not super tight. However, I’m giving it four stars because I think it should cover more of the front on the edges. I love that this case allows the beauty of my phone to show while protecting it. Now, if you are a person that needs heavy duty protection on your phone, this is not the case for you. I, however, don’t need that kind of protection so it works very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Not the clear case I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a good material. It seems to also protect the iPhone X enough. The main thing what I dislike about it is that it gets yellow with you after about 3 to 6 months. Looks ugly by now. Claim that it doesn’t get yello is not true.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: For me this 'invisible' protector is perfect. My iPhone rarely leaves my office so I ...
customer_reviews.text: For me this 'invisible' protector is perfect. My iPhone rarely leaves my office so I wanted basic protection for the camera lens(s) on the backside. This case is perfect for that as I am not always super careful when slam it down on my desk. There is no perceivable weight increase and it is not noticeable by others when in my office. Great job ESRC.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: A Year Late
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for the past year. I’ve just upgraded to the Xs Max and now that I’m looking for a case for the new device, finally realized what a great case this was. Let’s get real. This isn’t an Otter. If you tend to drop your phone on a regular basis, this case is not for you. To me, the big reason for getting this case is to maintain the beauty of the device, without adding bulk or distorting the visual aesthetics. As such, I’m going with vanity over security.
customer_reviews.author: FrankSFO

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I wanted and very happy that it was available for the iPhone X even ...
customer_reviews.text: A soft to the touch, clear case, is all I want. This is exactly what I wanted and very happy that it was available for the iPhone X even though the phone hasn’t been released yet. I wanted this befor the phone to be prepared for my phone. It’s a crystal clear case and I was very pleased when I took it out of the package. Can’t wait to put it in my iPhone X!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good case for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. Very thin and low profile, protects from scratches, doesn’t add bulk to the phone. The only down side I had was it discolored quickly. I’ve had it a couple months now and It’s at the point where it looks pretty terrible and I need to replace it. Honestly can’t complain for the price though!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these so far, they do a good job of protecting your phone. Overtime they yellow an awful lot, which is why I ended up replacing the first one. Yellowing aside, it certainly does keep your phone well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Antonio Bueno Roca

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, shows off the beauty of the iPhone X, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: This case has a terrific fit. People don't notice that the case is even on my phone and comment I should get one to protect it. I did drop my X about 2 feet and the display cracked but the case protected the rest of the phone from any scratches. I would recommend a protective film for your display. The case slides easily in and out of my pants pocket and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Pickrell

customer_reviews.title: Ugly but still works
customer_reviews.text: The micro-dot pattern is noticeably ugly and there's branding on the edge of this case. Not what I expected. Update: I received a message from customer support offering me an exchange or refund. Representative was totally helpful, professional and kind. Even if you don't like this product, the customer service will win you over!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case. This is the best case I have purchase for my phone. I am usually a leather sack person, but this case works much better for the iPhone X. Not bulky and the rubber protects well. I will get another one, as cases in general gets discoloration issues after multiple use like any other item you hold in the same spot daily.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great clear soft case from ESR
customer_reviews.text: I am quickly becoming a big fan of ESR. Their phone cases and screen protectors are amazing. This case is crystal clear and offers the right amount of protection grip while showing off the beauty of the iPhone XS. I was recommend this case to anyone looking for an affordable and crystal clear tpu case.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyintheD

customer_reviews.title: It stays on nicely but is still easy to remove for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This case fits my iPhone X well. It stays on nicely but is still easy to remove for cleaning. I have a steel plate under it for my magnetic holder and it doesn’t interfere much, the phone hangs secure. I have not gotten my charging station yet but don’t see that being an issue either. Next time I will see if they have them in colors, I can see how clear will show dirt and grime over time.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value and shows off iPhone
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is an exceptional value. Fits perfectly and shows off the phone. Some complain about the micro dots but quite frankly, I don't notice them and would not have noticed them if I had not looked. All cutouts are precision, line up perfectly and this really shows off the iPhone. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EdW

customer_reviews.title: So cute but not very good protection for phone
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is nice but not very good protection for the phone =\ I had this one case on my phone since buying it and never damaged it in any way after dropping it a million times.. the minute I switch the case to this one my screen cracks =/
customer_reviews.author: L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good grip, not too bulky
customer_reviews.text: Got the blackish version and love it. Always wish these were thinner, but it doesn't add much bulk. Best part is that it provides some grip so phone won't slide out of my hand - preventing the drop may be better than trying to cushion the fall with some huge ugly protector!!
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Touch
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used very protective cases, but decided to try something simpler. I wanted a smaller footprint, yet enjoy the glossy black of my iPhone. This case meets that goal. I don’t believe it will give you much prevention from damage if you drop your device, so keep that in mind. Appearance and use is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some discoloration from fingers over time
customer_reviews.text: Great case! I’ve dropped my phone many times and had no issues. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because the case gets dingy. After about 6-8 months you can see dark spots where oil from your fingers has transferred over time and won’t come out. I’d say you need to buy 2 of these cases per year if you want it to always be completely clear.
customer_reviews.author: Jinger H.

customer_reviews.title: Super slim and protected my phone well when I dropped it on concrete
customer_reviews.text: I hate having a cover on my phone because it makes it look bulky. I’ve never been that happy with any phone case in the past. Love how slim this case is! I bought it in another color before and decided to buy this color. Doesn’t look like I have a case on my phone in this color.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great slim case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in both transparent and rose gold. I wish I would’ve purchased the silver instead of the clear, as I think it would look great, but the clear still shows off the phone well. Adds no bulk but protects from surface scratches. Exactly what I wanted! As stated below, this likely will NOT protect the phone from major drops, as it is rubber/soft/flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Slim, and transparent
customer_reviews.text: These are best cover for my IPhone XS, slim and transparent. It doesn’t offer extra protection but can cover phone’s edges from straching. Only issue is, it turns yellowish after few months which is not noticeable on my Golden phone.
customer_reviews.author: Arjun

customer_reviews.title: Fit seemed to be of low-quality
customer_reviews.text: I had to tug on each corner to get it to fit. As it was, the cut-outs for lightning and speakers were slightly crooked. Biggest problem was terrible fit over the button on right side of phone. You had to exert a lot of pressure to push that button through the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Kent

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion this is the best case for the silver iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is the best case for the silver iPhone X. The phone is just too slippery to use without a case and this just gives it enough grip and protection, while still showing the silver trim and white back. For the space gray you might have a lot more options, but if you specifically opt for the silver phone then you definitely want to show the sides and the back. This phone does that, while adding grip and some protection.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great case.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels great too. And it’s thin enough that it will not make your iPhone X bulky. And it’s completly transparent. If you drop your phone a lot, this case might not offer enough anti crack protection.
customer_reviews.author: Mircea C.

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, you hardly know it's there
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case. I've dropped my phone several times and still haven't scratched the back or broken the glass. The case wraps around just enough so if you drop it face down the phone doesn't break.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGirl

customer_reviews.title: 2 Years and still using...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 years ago and it still is on my phone. Best money ever spent. I keep a glass protector on my phone, but as far as damage to the body of the phone otherwise, NOTHING. And I drop it all the time. It is slim. It does honor the integrity of the design of the phone. It doesn't stretch. Doesn't tint. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing seller/brand! Not my favorite case
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for seller. 3 stars for the case. When I posted my original review expressing dissatisfaction, the seller immediately emailed me and offered a refund, no questions asked. How about that for caring about the customer! Pros: i like the material, it is nice and grippy in your hands and very grippy on surfaces. It seems like high quality for the price. It has not shown signs of absorbing the color from my jeans yet so that's a plus! Cons: needs a thicker front lip to elevate the screen when placed screen down and for drop protection. Also the back needs feet or a ridge around the perimeter, in order to protect the protruding camera.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wright

customer_reviews.title: Slim and simple
customer_reviews.text: I got this case because I needed something cheap and that would ship quickly. This case definitely fit the mold and then some. I’m super surprised at how much I like the case. I needed this to provide my Iphonex with some sort protection while I wait to find a heavier duty case. I’m not sure how much this will protect my phone during an impact. It fits the IPhone X really well and the rose gold color is beautiful. Buttons are very easily accessible as well! If you are looking for something slim and simple then you can’t go wrong with this case.
customer_reviews.author: N.Tran

customer_reviews.title: Good...
customer_reviews.text: The case delivers on all the features except that the glass is so smooth that it falls off anywhere you place it that’s not level. I have to put it down with the phone facing down because the side rubber guard provides a Non skid effect but not when the phone is facing up
customer_reviews.author: ESB

customer_reviews.title: Durable but gets discolored
customer_reviews.text: Well made in terms of materials they use and their durability. Easy to put On and take off the phone. The only downfall is that the clear version of this phone cover has discolored severely and now from clear it turned dark, almost not clear at all (blackish). I had it for a year now.
customer_reviews.author: itusia

customer_reviews.title: Super thin, light, and my new favorite case!
customer_reviews.text: Really great thin case and exactly what I wanted. The size difference between this and other more protective cases is night and day. This is very thin. If you’re looking for drop protection, I would avoid this. If you want something that adds the minimal amount of thickness and weight, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy S

customer_reviews.title: No longer crustal clear, must have changes the material.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these cases previous to this 3rd one. They were great, crystal clear. Eventually, they yellowed, but that goes with the territory. This 3rd case, they must have changed their base material or something, because the material is no longer crystal clear. It has more of a white tint to the plastic. Other than the color the case is still great, but if you're looking for crystal clear, like I am, keep looking. I Will be moving on to a different brand now.
customer_reviews.author: ERIK F.

customer_reviews.title: Best iPhone X case I own
customer_reviews.text: Anyone in the mood for a no-nonsense case that can handle its own, this is for you. No need to baby your phone, which should be able to withstand a drop or two. Came here because I was attempting to buy a new one, since the color has been fading on my black case for a little less than a year. It still works perfectly and still protects my phone 100%. Unfortunately out of stock at the time of writing, but would love to hear about a discount or replacement if this exists for my otherwise PERFECT CASE.
customer_reviews.author: uptownvice

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what the products says
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to keep the thin profile of my iPhone XS and still see the actual phone. The case fits perfectly and has just enough grip to not slip out of my hand. It does get some fingerprints but they wipe off VERY easily. Worth the purchase and way better quality than I expected for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SClark

customer_reviews.title: Button hard to press
customer_reviews.text: The case covered my iphone XS phone well but the side button is hard to press. Might be difficult to double press for apple pay if you use that often. Maybe it will improve with use but I now tend to just let the screen time out rather than press the button to have the phone sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Brad B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit.
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and it isn’t so beefy. It easily fits in my holster case. I like a case that doesn’t hide my million dollar phone. Let’s see the darn thing so this is a good cover.
customer_reviews.author: VicDelta

customer_reviews.title: fits iphone 10 really well easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something with a little bit of grip as the beautiful phone is ready to hit the floor with its slickness. this case delivered that. I love the slim look, buttons work great and I am really happy. Only had it 3 days so I do not know if it yellows. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: newcastlebrown

customer_reviews.title: Minimal protection is fine for someone like me who handles their expensive phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Minimal protection is fine for someone like me who handles their expensive phone carefully. The clear shows the beauty of the slate glass/steel enclosure and it has a slightly soft grippy texture so it’s not slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Gainsborough

customer_reviews.title: LOVE ALL OF ESR’s PRODUCTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love all of ESR’s products. I have bought their screen protectors in the past and still using the same one to this day after MANY drops, dings, ect. I decided to get this phone case also from ESR and it’s perfect!!! The fit, the hold, the durability and look are all great! I will definitely be purchasing more products from ESR in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Razzi

customer_reviews.title: it fits snugly and provides a little bit of rubberized feel that gives a better grip than metal/glass but less then rubber bare TPU
customer_reviews.text: The highs: it fits snugly and provides a little bit of rubberized feel that gives a better grip than metal/glass but less then rubber bare TPU. The lows: The sides don't fully overlap enough (maybe a millimeter) so if there's inperfections on the surface the screen could scratch. The disqualifier: Like another reviewer's case after a few days/weeks the black semi-rubberized coating on the outside started to chip/flake off showing the silver color of the case. It's annoying but still protecting the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jackfruit

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I like this case very much. It’s all that is advertised. A well-made product that looks great and has a good feel, not too bulky but enough thickness for adequate protection. It’s the ideal minimalist clear protector for my iPhone X. I’ve had it for a few weeks now and see no flaws in its design or function. An excellent product for a great price. I would highly recommend this product to a friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Caddy99

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, thin case for IPhone X
customer_reviews.text: I have the iPhone X in Space Gray, Perfect fit and no weird bubbles under the case. My iPhone looks like it doesn’t have a case on it! Very thin gel case, but extends to protect the screen and camera lenses on the back. I would like to see what the clear one looks like on it next. I recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Raleighs

customer_reviews.title: Protective but discolored very early on (Clear Case)
customer_reviews.text: I drop my phone near daily and this case has protected it for every fall, but coming up on a year you can see in my attached image that this has discolored. I wash my hand regularly, and I never use lotion so this was never meant to remain clear for long.
customer_reviews.author: Lince

customer_reviews.title: Has started to get yellow. Power button hard to press.
customer_reviews.text: 1. It has started to get yellow and I have only used it for 5 months. Mostly indoors. Pictures might show the yellowness. 2. The power button is very hard to press. Often times I put too much energy and press the volume button as well (resulting in a screenshot).
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE FROM PREVIOUS REVIEW.Lock button felt loose when pressed 😣
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Someone from IllusDesign reached out to me to resolve my complaint and sent me a new case which is a perfect fit! I was amazed and completely satisfied with their customer support. Thank uou so much! I like that it’s slim and it looks really nice. My only issue is the lock button. It’s a bit loose and it bothers me when I press that button. There’s like an air gap which is really annoying. I hope they can send a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Myca

customer_reviews.title: Great case that fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the iPhone X nicely. Not too big and very flexible and "rubbery". The back has a slight raised lip around the camera to further protect the lens from scratches. On the front side the case is flush with the screen so if you lay it face down consider getting a screen protector. Overall all very nice inexpensive case.
customer_reviews.author: Deeve

customer_reviews.title: No name, No problem
customer_reviews.text: This is a really decent slim and sleek case. It is a thin but soft-touch type of material, and there is no exposed logo when used. Very minor gripe is that the case can slip off one of the corners with heavy pocket/depocketing, but other than that, it's been a really good value and added protection.
customer_reviews.author: sokokyu

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I've read reviews about tempered glass protectors breaking, coming unglued, hard to install, etc., but this TechMatte protector installed perfectly on the first try, and so far has stayed sealed all over, with no bubbles or de-lamination. I only say "so far" because I've had it less than 1 month, but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Really good case, shows the great design of my iPhone. Love the glass back makes the phone looks like it doesn’t have a case on. The only flaw is because it’s a glass back, the phone tend to slide a lot on surfaces. My iPhone almost slid off the table because of my fan spinning and causing vibration. Other then that the case is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Wazir

customer_reviews.title: perfect for those who want minimal bulk
customer_reviews.text: perfect for those who want minimal bulk, but JUST enough to protect everything from normal wear. For those wondering, yes this has a lip that protrudes above the screen, so placing it face down on a surface won't have the surface contacting the screen. I don't know how well it'd do in a face down drop though; probably depend a lot on the surface and texture of the ground. Oh, but you'll need a very thin screen protector, like the films rather than the tempered glass. I found a good film and prefer it over the tempered glass anyway: "Supershieldz" also on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bales

customer_reviews.title: Very nice minimalist case.
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. Slips on easily, fits perfectly, improves the grip, and adds minimal bulk to the phone. Wireless charging still works. I haven't tried the charging without the case, so I can't compare, but it works fine with it. Protection is probably minimal, but I don't want a large bulky case.
customer_reviews.author: moonhawk

customer_reviews.title: Really protects your phone.
customer_reviews.text: They guaranteed a 6 month no brown-ness to the case when I bought it. It browned out within 4 months but they sent a new one. Lasted 6 months this time. Dropped the phone multiple times too and didn’t even dent the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Arman Ogandzhanyan

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, low quality
customer_reviews.text: For $13 I expected a much higher quality case. The material feels cheap and looks slightly yellow instead of clear, and it BARELY fits my iPhone X. The material seems to be lacking the anti fingerprint properties as advertised. The case smudges and collects dirt and moisture, all easily visible. I’ve purchased clear TPU cases in the past for 99 cents that feel about equivalent to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t protect the phone😩😩
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case in September 2018. I had a good screen protector on it. I dropped my phone recently and this case, unfortunately did not protect the corners or the screen AT ALL!! So, to date, I am on the hunt for a durable case. My screen in cracked in multiple places and the phone’s edges are chipped. Yes, this case is sleek and fits in the pocket nicely, but if you are looking for overall protection for your phone, save yourself the time and invest elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: TU

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit as well
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black jelly case from same ad and it fit well. I wanted to get the solid black and the solid black is lesser quality and doesn't fit as well. It's on my shelf and I'm back to the jelly case because it fits better. Not worth $13
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: is pretty slippery, so pretty happy to have the case
customer_reviews.text: Fits the iPhone X well. The iPhone X, with its glass back, is pretty slippery, so pretty happy to have the case. Haven't tested dropping the iPhone X and don't plan on testing that (unless you have an extra $1,000 to give me), so I don't know how protective the case is.
customer_reviews.author: John K. Lin

customer_reviews.title: This is my third iPhone x case and I like this one the best
customer_reviews.text: This is my third iPhone x case and I like this one the best. It's the thinnest of the three and feels best in my hands. Has a nice grip without feeling sticky and protects all sides, the cutouts are all exactly as they should be and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t protect phone
customer_reviews.text: The case doesn’t cover the side of the phone and offers no protection when dropped face down. Typically aides of a case cover at minimum the thickness of the phone. This case does not.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne T.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Very slim, fits snugly, and makes the phone less 'slippery'. Very happy with this!!! The lip hangs over the screen by just a hair - just enough to protect it when face down, but not enough to get in the way. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S. Williams

product_meta.title: ESR Slim Clear Soft TPU Case for iPhone Xs/iPhone X, Soft Flexible Cover Compatible for 5.8 inch(2017 & 2018 Release)(Jelly Clear)
feature_bullets: Compatibility: Compatible with the iPhone 5.8", both iPhone Xs and iPhone X (Released in 2018 & 2017).
[Thin & Light]: Only 1mm thin, won't add bulk to your iPhone Xs / iPhone X.
[Soft TPU with Air-Guard Corner Design]: iPhone Xs/X Soft TPU case provide better protection than hard PC/PP for the iPhone's glass back.
[Screen and Camera Protection]: Raised camera and screen edge to protect your camera and screen of iPhone Xs/X from scratching.
Prevents Clinging: Microdot patterning will prevent the clinging "wet look", keeping your iPhone Xs/X looking great with your iPhone Xs clear case.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars9,399 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
